snippet: The number of sexual assaults reported annually to the Navy has grown by about 50 percent in the past year, which Navy officials said was a sign that more sailors felt comfortable reporting an assault.
abstract: Number of sexual assaults reported annually to the Navy has grown by about 50 percent in the last year, which Navy officials say is a sign that more sailors felt comfortable reporting an assault and believed something would be done about it.
lead_paragraph: The number of sexual assaults reported annually to the Navy has grown by about 50 percent in the past year, which Navy officials said was a sign that more sailors felt comfortable reporting an assault.

headline.main: Reports of Navy Sexual Assaults Rise
headline.print_headline: Reports Of Navy Sexual Assaults Rise
